name: handover
description: 📋 국방업무공유체계 – 업무 인수인계 및 공유 플랫폼

scripts.clean: npm run down && npm run prune
scripts.build: npm run down && docker compose build --parallel
scripts.build:dev: npm run down && docker compose --file docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache --parallel
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && docker compose --file docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.prd: npm run build && docker compose up
